arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Sheffield Wednesday: Knight shines again and leads by example
arts.sum: The right-back looked really bright down the right-hand side for City and was a real threat with the ball at his feat. More good minutes for Hirakawa, who also moved out onto the left when Sykes replaced Mehmeti.

arts.ttl: Sheff Wed hold on for a point at Bristol City
arts.sum: Di'Shon Bernard starred in a resolute defence as Sheffield Wednesday defied heavy Bristol City pressure to earn a battling 0-0 draw in the Championship.

arts.sum: The latest Sheffield Wednesday team news as Danny Rohl's side gear up to face Bristol City in the Championship. The post Musaba starts: Sheffield Wednesday team news and predicted XI to face Bristol City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: The incredible lengths Bristol City and Liam Manning are going to unlock Yu Hirakawa potential
arts.sum: Although Hirakawa missed the opening weeks of the Championship season through injury, the winger had already played 18 games for Machida Zelvia this year, with the J1 League campaign getting underway in February. Although the exciting talent’s stay at Ashton Gate has been fast-paced following his arrival on a season-long loan deal from J1 League outfit Machida Zelvia, Manning is adamant it will take time for Hirakawa to adapt to life in England and in the Championship.

arts.ttl: Liam Manning lifts lid on key Bristol City strength as competition for places heats up
arts.sum: Liam Manning has praised Bristol City’s strength in depth and has called on all of his players to be ready to make the step up when selected. And the quality in depth is something Manning has applauded but has called on players who are out of the squad to step up when selected.

arts.ttl: The exciting Bristol City prospect over Scott Twine after role change against Swansea City
arts.sum: It’s a position some of the Ashton Gate faithful were keen to see the summer arrival feature in more regularly having started on the left wing in every Championship outing prior to Sunday’s 1-1 draw against the Swans. Despite being moved into a more central attacking midfield position behind Sinclair Armstrong at the Swansea.com Stadium, Manning explained a key reason behind the switch was to give the former Burnley talent "freedom".

arts.ttl: ‘Will edge it’ – Bristol City vs Sheffield Wednesday prediction: The72
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Bristol City vs Sheffield Wednesday prediction ahead of the Championship clash on Wednesday. The post ‘Will edge it’ – Bristol City vs Sheffield Wednesday prediction: The72 appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: ‘We suffered’ - Luke Williams criticises Swansea City's second-half display in Bristol City draw - Bristol Live
arts.sum: With the Robins' tails up, they came close to a winner through substitute Sykes, who was denied by a great stop by Lawrence Vigouroux to keep the scores level and Williams believed Swansea struggled to cope with the second half City onslaught - claiming his Swans side were the worst team on the pitch. Swansea City “suffered” in the second half against Bristol City, according to boss Luke Williams, who also believed his side were lucky to come away with a point against the Robins.
